title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 895.1 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 895.1 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) A filing fee
shall be paid to the commission, according to the schedule herein, at the time
of filing each application for project review, pursuant to section
3.8
and article 10 of the Delaware

River Basin Compact. Government agencies shall be exempt from such filing
fees. (b) The project review filing
fee is the greater of paragraph (1) or (2) as follows, and (3), if and as
applicable: (1)
minimum fee: $250 for any
project that requires commission action; (2)
alternative fee: (i) 1/10 of 1% of project cost to
$10,000,000; (ii)
1/25 of 1% of
remaining cost above $10,000,000 but not to exceed a maximum fee of $50,000 as
to any one project. (3)
for any project that results in an out-of-basin diversion, the fee as described
above is increased by 50%. (c) The project cost shall include the
estimated costs of design, supervision of construction, legal services, contract administration, land, materials, equipment, construction and
fabrication. (d) Revenues received
pursuant to this regulation shall go into the commission's general fund and be
subject to specific appropriation by the commission. (e) Each substantial project revision or
modification following commission action requires an additional filing
fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
895.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
